Text: Re Draft Outline Cc file SCE comments draft issues outline doc Comments from SCE in redline Evelyn Kahl To Bill Booth Dorothy Rothrock m Phil Isenberg Delaney Hunter Mike Kahl Jeff Dasovich Email Dominic DiMare PM Ann Cohn John Fielder Email Robert Albergotti Jack Stewart Keith McCrea Mike Florio Email cc Subject Draft Outline Attached for your redlining pleasure is a copy of the draft we circulated at the end of todays meeting with modifications suggested following the meeting in Sections and See attached file draft issues outline doc SCE comments draft issues outline doc draft issues outline doc

URG Testimonyis the testimony on the revenue requirement for SCE owned generation and contracts including QFs that was filed yesterday in response to the ACR There was also an appendix B which contains the advice letter filings referred to in the testimony These advice letters E EA EB and EA are available on the SCE website wwwscecom and then clicking on Regulatory Info Center See attached file sceLetter re TestimonydocSee attached file scedocSee attached file appendix Adoc sceLetter re Testimonydoc scedoc appendix Adoc

Re Technical Working Group Cc file URG Cost Recovery and Balancing Account Legdoc Heres a first cut Its undergoing siimultaneous review within SCE Delaney Hunter To Delaney Hunter k Mike Kahl Email wcom Barbara Barkovich Email John White Email Ann PM Cohn Email John Please Fielder Email Gary respond to Schoonyan Email Jeff dhunter Dasovich Email Keith McCrea Email Dorothy Rothrock Email cc Phil Isenberg Email Subject Technical Working Group Everyone Please use this distribution list to respond to and or send out to I inadvertently screwed up on Dorothys email but have now fixed it My bad Delaney URG Cost Recovery and Balancing Account Legdoc

Re Merged Leg Document Cc file sce comments on Merged Legdoc Here are some comments from SCE in redline form I struck out Jeffs and Barbaras sections Im assuming that Delaney will insert Barbaras revised version and Jeffs was duplicative of Dorothys Linda Sherif has not had a chance to review the changes to the selfgen section She and I discussed a new definition for a and her language addresses my concern She will be getting that language to you after she reviews with Mike Kahl She said she would let me know if Mike revises the language I wish there was more time to do a more comprehensive edit Delaney Hunter To Barbara Barkovich Email k John White wcom Email Ann Cohn Email John Fielder Email Gary PM Schoonyan Email Please Jeff Dasovich Email respond to Dorothy Rothrock dhunter Email Keith McCrea Email cc Linda Sherif Email Linda Sherif Email Phil Isenberg Email Subject Merged Leg Document All I have merged everyones seperate language into one document this may be easier to work from today especially for those of you on the phone Talk to you all at Thanks Delaney See attached file MERGED LEG LANGUAGEdoc sce comments on Merged Legdoc MERGED LEG LANGUAGEdoc

Ann CohnSCEEIX is out of the officeI will be out of the office starting and will not return until I will be out of the office until July I will respond to your message when I return If you need immediate assistance please contact my assistant Joyce Nakata
